entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add environment capability to UserSecrets (secrets.json) #99565
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.BufferBlock - Memory leak on OutputAvailableAsync #99564
  • [wasm] broad regressions in vector performance under interpreter #99554
  • [wasm] Compiled regexes in interpreter ~25-50x regression #99553
  • JIT_NewS_MP_FastPortable is slow for Orchard CMS benchmark on Linux-arm64 #99552
  • Assertion failed 'addrClone != nullptr' #99551
  • [browser][ws] WebSocket works differently depending on if we look up its state or not #99545
  • Assertion failed 'lastBlockILEndOffset < beginOffs' #99543
  • Null dereference in forward subtitution #99540
  • WASM: Assembly search path should be relative to the blazor.boot.json, not the importing module. #99539
  • Inconsistent handling of duplicate keys in INI configuration files #99535
  • `DiagnosticListener` disposal does not remove existing subscriptions #99523
  • [iOS][non-icu] Clean up ICU related files from runtime pack #99521
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Assertion failed: 0 <= fd && fd < sysconf(_SC_OPEN_MAX) #99520
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Some tests deadlock without -backgroundExec #99519
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed in SafeFileHandle.OverlappedValueTaskSource.IOCallback #99517
  • Support control flow guard on x86 Windows #99516
    Future
  • [iOS/HybridGlobalization] Force short date pattern to use yyyy #99515
  • [MONO][Wasm] Potential function signature mismatch in m2n invoke #99514
  • [API Proposal]: Generic MemberwiseClone<T> #99510

Closed

  • [System.Reflection.Emit] AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndCollect not collecting assemblies #99559
  • Incorrect value returned by `Environment.ProcessorCount` when running on GCP Cloud Run resulting in memory problems. #99046
    9.0.0
  • Native AOT SOS debugging on MacOS isn't working #99503
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Xml.XPath to support XPath 3.1 and their XSLT variants #99544
  • Transactional File Manager #99498
  • ValidationContext doesn't support GetKeyedService() method. #97019
  • Avoid generating degenerate flow during redundant branch optimization #48609
    Future
  • [mono] Missing box optimizations in the interpreter #99463
  • [8.0][wasm] Failure in CalendarTestBase.TestJapaneseCalendarDateParsing affecting several globalization tests #99378
  • [browser][MT] Depleted pthreadPoolSize #97913
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] MutexTests.NamedMutex_ThreadExitDisposeRaceTest #97968
    9.0.0
  • [mt][browser] JsImportTaskEchoPendingResult fails #98035
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.ThreadingTimer #98216
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] RangeError: Invalid typed array length #98217
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskAwaitPendingResult #98219
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] MutexTests.AbandonExisting #98830
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonDerivedTypeAttribute<T> for simplified polymorphic JSON configuration #99421
  • [API Proposal]: Support JsonCommentHandling.Allow in JsonNode #98865
  • Call to gc_heap::create_bgc_thread hanging #96984
  • [NativeAOT] Publish NativeAOT Got Dependency Error #97442
  • Question: zip file hash digest calculation #99518
  • [HTTP/2] Reading data assert #99494
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [7.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the March release #99567
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.18
  • Analyze recursive interfaces in illink #99566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Be more liberal when detecting cgroup version #99563
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold const index access for static readonly string #99562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add fgRedirectTrueEdge, fgRedirectFalseEdge #99561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add RID for Alpine 3.19 / 3.20 #99560
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Disable jiterp safepoints in single-threaded WASM #99558
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix mustExpand check to account for inlining #99557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `m_srcUseLclFld` and `m_dstUseLclFld` #99556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsGenericType #99555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Don't inline methods with the DoesNotReturn attribute in interp #99550
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve precision of the vectorized trig functions #99549
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • Added SIMD path for Vector3, Quaternion and Matrix4x4 operations #99547
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add a parent check to the forward substitution tree walk #99546
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize memory allocations (#98702) #99542
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • JIT: more likelihood checking #99541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use existing Range vectorized fill in Enumerable.OrderBy #99538
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • [mt][browser] Prevent `SignalRClientTests` fail with "PlaywrightException: Target closed" #99537
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Add enums to Enumerable.Order implicitly stable check #99533
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • Fix: resources leak in ActiveDirectorySchemaClass in GetPropertyValuesRecursively #99526
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] Update boot.json manifest generation order #99525
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser][mt] drop managed keepalive from thread pool #99524
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] WS cancelation fix #99522
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add a new GC handle and use it to simplify NativeAOT corelib #99512
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_HO,HP,HS #99058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add BV_2B #99534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add BS_1A, BT_1A #99458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Cleanup ifdefs #99511
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Be more liberal when detecting cgroup version #99508
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [6.0] Fix usage of recycled lists in the thread pool #99387
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.29
  • Always display statement information #99531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Always keep global symbols on ApplePlatforms #99504
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99375
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #99376
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #99374
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/8.0-staging] Check if AttributeData for InterfaceTypeAttribute is not null in ConvertComImportToGeneratedComInterfaceAnalyzer #98873
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.4
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Home float parameters before integer parameters #98749
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [mono][jit] Optimize JIT time on platforms without SIMD support. #99485
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99472
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add ILLink/ILCompiler support for feature checks #99267
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove ref assembly code from CodeQL scans #99469
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Shipping internal package for webcil #99380
    area-Build-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix overaggressive switch optimization in regex source generator #99431
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • JIT: don't create degenerate flow in `fgReplaceJumpTarget` #99509
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][bench] Check for the muteErrors presence #99536
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Avoid generating linker range extension thunks #99208
    arch-arm32, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Add win-x86 support #99372
    arch-x86, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Consolidate block scaling logic #99234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Guard against non-sensical ReadyToRunGenericHelperNode #99513
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Http/2] Fix handling of effectively empty DATA frame #99502
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser][MT] fix various issues and enable System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests #99000
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add pred block iterator that tolerates pred list modifications #99466
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask and LoadVector #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Enable most SDL-required C/C++ warnings #99470
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BW_2A #99411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #99467
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: inline shared generics with runtime lookups inside #99265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Swift lowering algorithm in the CoreCLR type system #99438
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Preserve all InternalsVisibleTo attributes in ILLink Trimmer #98910
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition #97159
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [WIP] [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #99413
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser
  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix negative lookaround stack handling #99424
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99473
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.30
  • [release/7.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99474
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.19
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99475
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.5
  • [riscv64] fix linq MixedScope test #96671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #99449
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Improve perf\allocs of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #99383
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [CoreCLR and native AOT] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic parameters #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] dedicated io thread #99422
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Initialize native layout info for small structs during type load #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Added SIMD support for vector 2/3/4 methods #98761
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support frozen structs for Swift pinvokes #99294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable building tests with UseLocalAppHostPack=true #99354
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [cdac] Add data stream library #99442
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Ensure edge likelihoods 3 #99460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
